Thoughts on how we simplify conversations for videogames, and an idea for an approach that might be better-informed:
http://t.co/TeKBVsAPvQ
I should continue this in a blog post to avoid flooding your feed!
Whereas when we simplify people to the same extent, the things we lose seem like a big deal, and the simplifcation feels crude.
We mean that when you simplify violence into something that *is* easy to simulate, the fidelity you lose isn't stuff we care about.
Made me realise how many judgements and assumptions we make in saying "Violence is easy to simulate."
